generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with visible lane markings and crosswalks, which is the primary surface for vehicle movement.
- sidewalk: A sidewalk is visible on the left side of the road, bordered by a curb and trees, where pedestrians are walking.
- building: Several buildings are visible in the background and on the right side of the image, including a large gray building with signage.
- fence: A fence is visible along the left side of the road, separating the sidewalk from a green area.
- pole: Multiple poles are visible, including those supporting traffic lights and streetlights.
- traffic light: Traffic lights are visible at the intersection, showing red signals.
- traffic sign: Traffic signs are visible, including a "no right turn" sign and directional signs for "Affoltern a. A." and "Triemli-Spital."
- vegetation: Trees are visible along the road and in the background, providing greenery.
- sky: The sky is visible above the buildings and trees, showing a clear blue sky with some clouds.
- person: Pedestrians are visible crossing the street and walking on the sidewalk.
- car: Several cars are visible, including a gray car on the right side of the image and a dark-colored car on the left side.
- bicycle: A person is riding a bicycle on the left side of the road.
